abstract: Over 40,000 people attended the D23 Expo, a biannual gathering that the media and entertainment conglomerate billed as “the ultimate Disney fan event.”
snippet: Over 40,000 people attended the D23 Expo, a biannual gathering that the media and entertainment conglomerate billed as “the ultimate Disney fan event.”
lead_paragraph: ANAHEIM, Calif. — Fans are by their nature hyper-enthusiastic. But throw red meat at them — as the Walt Disney Company did to devotees here over the weekend, previewing new movies and theme park rides — and the clamor can be downright daunting, especially for buttoned-up Disney executives.

headline.main: Fans Flock to Disney Expo in California
